arts.ttl: Aston Villa, Maccabi Tel Aviv starting lineups confirmed! Emery makes Watkins decision for Europa League tie
arts.sum: Aston Villa and Maccabi Tel Aviv announce their starting lineups for Thursday's Europa League fixture at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Europa League: Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv, Rangers v Roma, and more – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Europa League updates from the 8pm GMT kick-offs ⚽ Live scores | Read today’s Football Daily | Mail Michael We are here because we love association football, but sport does not exist in a vacuum. Sometimes it can be caught in the crosshairs of something larger and that is certainly the case tonight. This is a football liveblog, and we have nine Europa League 8pm GMT kick-offs to follow, of which Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv is one. My focus is on the football but I will also bring you any notable developments around the fringes of Villa Park, should there be any. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Watch live Villa Park protest ahead of Maccabi Tel Aviv Europa League match
arts.sum: Warning: This livefeed may contain offensive language and scenes viewers may find distressing.

arts.ttl: Police braced for clashes as protests begin ahead of Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: Protests are taking place near Villa Park as Aston Villa take on Israeli side Maccabi Tel Aviv

arts.ttl: View: Aston Villa ace set for star role vs Maccabi Tel Aviv after impressive Europa League stat revealed
arts.sum: Evann Guessand has been a polarising figure for the Aston Villa supporters this season. Guessand has been underwhelming for Villa in certain matches, with his... arts.ttl: Maccabi Tel Aviv-Aston Villa LIVE: 700 police in Birmingham city centre
arts.sum: Maccabi Tel Aviv fans were last month banned from attending the game due to safety concerns and today's match has been categorised by West Midlands Police as 'high risk'

arts.ttl: Aston Villa-Maccabi Tel Aviv protests live: Marches to be held after political fallout over Israeli club’s fans
arts.athr: Alex Ross,Flo Clifford and Will Castle
arts.sum: Pro-Palestine demonstrations and counter-protests are planned ahead of the controversial fixture

arts.ttl: Drones, dogs and 700 police: the massive security operation in place for Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: Protests expected at Villa Park after away fans were banned from attending

arts.ttl: Aston Villa hosts Maccabi Tel Aviv amid boosted security in Europa League
arts.sum: Maccabi fans are banned from the game after West Midlands Police deemed the match at Villa Park to be high risk and cited violence and hate crimes that took place when Maccabi Tel Aviv played at Ajax in Amsterdam last season . Aston Villa meets Maccabi Tel Aviv in the Europa League on Thursday amid boosted security measures including more than 700 police officers.

arts.ttl: Schools close early amid crowd trouble fears at Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv match
arts.sum: The tensions have led to a decision to ban Israeli fans and keep the away stands empty for the duration of the game
